guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
guild.description_html:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
guild.name: Ruqqus

body: No doubt. Ruqqus is here to stay. The length of comment chains, number of upvotes and turnover of content on the front page here is really starting to accelerate.

body: I do think we've passed the point where Ruqqus might die anytime soon. We have a stable userbase now.

body: Unfortunately there isn't, there's just enough difference between them that this would not violate copyrite. Ruqqie being a happy square with arms and legs, and this being a chat bubble sets them distinctly enough apart. Not that Ruqqus could afford to really sue Reddit even if it were a breach of their IP.
body_html: Unfortunately there isn't, there's just enough difference between them that this would not violate copyrite. Ruqqie being a happy square with arms and legs, and this being a chat bubble sets them distinctly enough apart. Not that Ruqqus could afford to really sue Reddit even if it were a breach of their IP.
